actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution calling upon the President of the United States to terminate certain agreements with the U.S.S.R. if that Government persists in its refusal to abide by agreements' requirement that a proportion of the cargo covered in the instrument be transported in U.S. vessels.

summary.text: Calls for a termination of specified maritime agreements between the U.S. and U.S.S.R. unless the U.S.S.R. ceases to deny the national-flag vessels of the U.S. the right to carry an equal share of the oceanborne commerce between the two countries.

titles.title: A resolution calling upon the President of the United States to terminate certain agreements with the U.S.S.R. if that Government persists in its refusal to abide by agreements' requirement that a proportion of the cargo covered in the instrument be transported in U.S. vessels.
